pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Jun1 shi4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: He was also named to the powerful Central Military Commission.
sentences.chinese: 他還被任命到權力巨大的中央軍事委員會。

sentences.english: Other military installations as prescribed by the State Council and the Central Military Commission.
sentences.chinese: 國務院和中央軍事委員會規定的其他軍事設施。

sentences.english: The chairman of the central military commission has overall responsibility for the commission.
sentences.chinese: 中央軍事委員會實行主席負責制。

sentences.english: Citation for Merit, Class I; conferment of honourable tiles and other awards stipulated by the Central Military Commission.
sentences.chinese: 授予中央軍事委員會規定的榮譽稱號以及其他獎勵。
